front.title: Proxy Mobile IPv6 Management Information Base

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB), the Proxy Mobile-IPv6 MIB, for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, the Proxy Mobile-IPv6 MIB will be used to monitor and control the mobile access gateway (MAG) node and the local mobility anchor (LMA) functions of a Proxy Mobile IPv6 (PMIPv6) entity.
